div.p: A week of grab and go meals will be available for pick at Canfield High School by the tennis courts from 11-1 on Monday, April 20, 2020, for families participating in the Free and Reduced Lunch Program during the emergency remote learning.Â For additional information please visit our FAQ section on the website.

span.p: A week of grab and go meals will be available for pick at Canfield High School by the tennis courts from 11-1 on Monday, April 20, 2020, for families participating in the Free and Reduced Lunch Program during the emergency remote learning.Â For additional information please visit our FAQ section on the website.

div.a: FAQ for Emergency Remote Learning Updated 4/17/2020 at 10:44 a.m.
div.span: The Canfield Local School District has created a list of questions about emergency remote learning organized by topic. The FAQ was updated on 4/17/2020 at 10:44 a.m. The newest questions are in italics.

a.title: Click to read more about: FAQ for Emergency Remote Learning Updated 4/17/2020 at 10:44 a.m.

div.a: Canfield Schools Pre-registering Incoming Kindergarten Students for the 2020-2021 School Year

div.a: Canfield Local Schools Receive Highest Rating for 5 Consecutive Years!
